nml_option.name: config_AM_regionalStats_enable
nml_option.description: If true, landice analysis member regionalStats is called.

nml_option.name: config_AM_regionalStats_compute_interval
nml_option.description: Timestamp determining how often analysis member computation should be performed.

nml_option.name: config_AM_regionalStats_stream_name
nml_option.description: Name of the stream that the regionalStats analysis member should be tied to.

nml_option.name: config_AM_regionalStats_compute_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member computation occurs on start-up.

nml_option.name: config_AM_regionalStats_write_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member write occurs on start-up.
